home.title: The Ulu – Luxury Beach Club & Hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali
home.description: The Ulu Beach Club & Bungalows is a luxury hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali. Experience stunning ocean views, private bungalows, beachfront dining, and an exclusive beach club — just minutes from Bali.
home.keywords: hotel bali, ulu hotel, the ulu hotel, hotel nusa lembongan, beach club bali, luxury resort bali, bungalow lembongan, hotel dekat bali, resort lembongan, the ulu beach club

top.description: Stay at The Ulu Hotel in Nusa Lembongan – a luxury beach club and bungalows overlooking the ocean, just a short boat ride from Bali.

about.title: About The Ulu – Beachfront Hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali
about.description: Learn about The Ulu Beach Club & Bungalows — a luxury beachfront hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali. Discover our story, vision, and what makes us a top-rated Bali island retreat.
about.keywords: about ulu hotel, the ulu story, beachfront hotel bali, luxury resort lembongan, hotel near bali

garden.title: Garden View Room – The Ulu Hotel Nusa Lembongan
garden.description: Book the Garden View Room at The Ulu Hotel, a luxury bungalow in Nusa Lembongan, Bali. Enjoy tropical garden scenery, AC, free WiFi, and a serene island atmosphere.
garden.keywords: garden view room bali, kamar hotel lembongan, bungalow lembongan, garden room nusa lembongan, the ulu room bali

pool.title: Pool View Room – The Ulu Hotel Nusa Lembongan
pool.description: Book the Pool View Room at The Ulu Hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali. Wake up to refreshing pool views in a luxurious private bungalow with world-class amenities.
pool.keywords: pool view room bali, pool bungalow lembongan, hotel with pool bali, kamar kolam renang lembongan, the ulu pool room

facilities.title: Facilities – Pool, Beach Club & Restaurants | The Ulu Bali
facilities.description: Explore world-class facilities at The Ulu Hotel in Nusa Lembongan: infinity pool, beach club, restaurant, and gym — making it one of the best resorts near Bali.
facilities.keywords: fasilitas hotel bali, beach club lembongan, infinity pool bali, resort facilities nusa lembongan, the ulu facilities

rooms.title: Rooms & Bungalows – The Ulu Hotel Nusa Lembongan, Bali
rooms.description: Choose from garden or pool view bungalows at The Ulu Hotel in Nusa Lembongan, Bali. Luxury rooms starting from IDR 1,150,000/night with stunning tropical views.
rooms.keywords: hotel rooms bali, bungalow nusa lembongan, resort kamar bali, ulu hotel rooms, luxury accommodation lembongan bali

garden.title: Overview
garden.overview: Our Garden View Rooms offer a serene escape with lush green landscapes right outside your window. Designed for comfort and relaxation, these rooms provide a peaceful retreat from the everyday hustle. Enjoy modern amenities and a tranquil atmosphere, making your stay both refreshing and memorable.

pool.title: Overview
pool.overview: Our Pool View Rooms offer a refreshing stay with beautiful views of the sparkling swimming pool. Designed for relaxation and comfort, these rooms create a calm and inviting atmosphere, perfect for unwinding while enjoying modern amenities and a soothing resort-style experience.

amenities.title: Room Amenities
amenities.desc: Experience unparalleled comfort with our comprehensive room amenities, designed to cater to your every need and enhance your stay.

hero.title: A Refined Tropical Beachfront in Lembongan
